law.text: A special assessment may be voted and bonds issued which shall be payable solely from the collection of such assessments, as provided in KRS 262.778 and 262.779.
law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 332, sec. 15, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 73. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 116, sec. 2.
